fields.description: Specifies the Distcp options. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: DistcpOptions

fields.description: Specifies the Yarn ResourceManager endpoint. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ResourceManagerEndpoint

fields.description: Specifies an existing folder path which will be used to store temp Distcp command script. The script file is generated by ADF and will be removed after Copy job finished. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: TempScriptPath
